body.p:
SPD/TVSS devices can optionally be installed on the primary and/or secondary sides of the transformer. SPDs are listed to UL 1449 3rd Edition and have the following ratings:
LEA SP100 providing 100,000 Amps maximum surge current dissipation per phase.
LEA SP200 providing 200,000 Amps maximum surge current dissipation per phase.

fig.title: One-Line for PDU with Single Main Input Circuit Breaker
